name: Lookup IP addresses stored in Google Sheets using IP2Proxy
description: Make will watch for new rows in a specified Google Sheets spreadsheet at regular intervals and lookup IP addresses in IP2Proxy, then update a row in Google Sheets using information found. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PPXFHPL3tpHjpKkeUKecgMyJGv86lUQnpQT2JnnkKHU/edit?usp=sharing).
